name: 5KPlayer
summary: New free media player with AirPlay supported
short_description:
5KPlayer is a new-style free media player for Mac OS as all-in-one HD video/music player, AirPlay streamer and free online video/music downloader.
Key features: 1. Play any media formats on Mac OS, including 4K/5K ultra HD videos, MKV, M2TS, AVCHD, AVI, MP4, WMV, DVD movies, YouTube video, MP3 music, etc; 2. With built-in AirPlay sender/receiver, free stream music/videos from iPhone, iPad to Mac, or from Mac to Apple TV or Airplay-enabled speakers; 3. As a powerful online video/music downloader supporting over 300 sites, download video/music free from YouTube (Vevo), FaceBook, Dailymotion, Vimeo and so on; 4. Have embedded radio player to play radio from BBC, Heart, XFM, Kiss, Magic and other internet radio stations. 5. As a YouTube to MP3 converter, free convert YouTube videos to MP3 or AAC music on Mac; 6. Work as an excellent file manager, easily organizing your video & music files.

For more info, please head over to http://www.5kplayer.com/
